mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.attr_id AS "attrId", a.attr_value AS "attrValue", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN goods_attr b ON b.id = a.attr_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_attr_value( id, goods_id, attr_id, attr_value, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{goodsId}, #{attrId}, #{attrValue}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE goods_attr_value SET goods_id = #{goodsId}, attr_id = #{attrId}, attr_value = #{attrValue}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
